markdown.markdown: Contact Info {#contact} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - jasmineqiu0@gmail.com - [github.com/Jasminni3](https://github.com/Jasminni3) - +1 510 598 7503 - For more information, please contact me via email. Skills {#skills} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Technical: Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Slides), Microsoft 365 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Canva, Stata, R, Python, QuickBooks - Expertise: Project Management, Market Research, Financial Analysis, Data Analysis, Consulting Disclaimer {#disclaimer} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This resume was made with the R package [**pagedown**](https://github.com/rstudio/pagedown). Last updated on `r Sys.Date()`. Main ================================================================================ Jasmine Ho Qiu {#title} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Aspiring Business Professional An aspiring business student with a focus on entry-level business roles and data analysis. Dedicated to applying academic knowledge and analytical skills to contribute effectively in dynamic organizational environments. Committed to leveraging data-driven insights to inform strategic decision-making and drive innovation. Education {data-icon=graduation-cap data-concise=true} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### University of California: San Diego B.S. in Business Economics; Minor in Finance San Diego, CA 2024 Professional Expereience {data-icon=laptop} -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Critical Thinking Game Designer Lirvana Labs (Learning Companion App) Menlo Park, CA October 2023 – -Helping to build an interactive, AI learning app for children globally (Thailand, Hong Kong, and Virginia) on a 7-member team -Implementing social-emotional learning models, laying the groundwork for the app's deployment in educational institutions around the world -Presenting the application of AI in education at the ASU+GSV AIR SHOW, delivering an impactful talk to a diverse audience of 50+ professionals ### Lead Instructor TechKnowHow (Summer Tech Camp) Oakland, CA June 2023 - August 2023 -Taught 20 students innovation utilizing LEGO building blocks and Scratch programming by creating engaging lesson plans and cultivating a supportive learning environment -Applied age-appropriate teaching methods to accommodate students’ diverse learning styles while still aligning with set curriculum objectives -Leveraged problem-solving skills to address and resolve classroom or personal conflicts to ensure a safe and enriching summer camp experience for all students ### People and Culture Intern GRID Alternatives (Renewable Energy Firm) San Diego, CA June 2022 - August 2022 -Conducted a comprehensive analysis of quantitative DEI data collected over 8 years to streamline and establish clear and transparent company metrics to define the upcoming fiscal year’s goals for all stakeholders -Collaborated with a team of 4 executives to strategize and implement innovative DEI initiatives, focused on copy-writing and having a progressive approach to implement a new maternity policy maternity policy ### Project Management Analyst Intern StarGazer Enterprise (Consulting Firm) Oakland, CA August 2020 - October 2020 -Organized and recorded company-wide financial transactions to ensure the accuracy of accounts payable and accounts receivables on QuickBooks -Conducted extensive market research on the background and actions of the BART Measure RR Oversight Committee ### Junior Consultant Banteay Srei (Social Advocacy Organization) Oakland, CA September 2018 - July 2020 -Developed a community action project by acquiring donations via fundraising, resulting in 50+ free feminine hygiene kits for homeless women in underserved neighborhoods -Created weekly workshops with PowerPoint, and led discussions on various topics centered around women's empowerment (ex: Self Defense, Reproductive Rights, Conflict Mediation) to an audience of 30+ students
